price: Innis ni jedhe: “Ani gara Rabbii kiyyaa deemaadha; Inni na qajeelcha.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
